items.summary: Ensure the correct canister ID is embedded in frontend/index.html meta tag so the ICP0.io gateway can resolve the frontend canister. Verify the canister ID in the meta tag matches the deployed frontend canister ID exactly, and that it is present at page load before any JS executes.

Ensure the backend canister ID referenced in the frontend actor configuration (useActor.ts and any generated declarations) matches the deployed backend canister ID. Regenerate or update canister ID bindings if there is a mismatch.

Audit the dfx.json and canister configuration to confirm that frontend and backend canister IDs are consistently defined and that the deployment targets the correct network (ic mainnet). Fix any misconfigured canister IDs or network targets.
